# background-video

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property            | Attribute            | Description                                                  | Type      | Default           |
| ------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------------- |
| `autoplay`          | `autoplay`           | Should video autoplay                                        | `boolean` | `undefined`       |
| `controls`          | `controls`           | Should video show controls                                   | `boolean` | `undefined`       |
| `loop`              | `loop`               | Should video loop                                            | `boolean` | `undefined`       |
| `muted`             | `muted`              | Should video be muted                                        | `boolean` | `undefined`       |
| `overlayBackground` | `overlay-background` | The overlay background                                       | `string`  | `undefined`       |
| `overlayOpacity`    | `overlay-opacity`    | The overlay background                                       | `string`  | `undefined`       |
| `poster`            | `poster`             | Video poster while loading                                   | `string`  | `undefined`       |
| `preload`           | `preload`            | Should video be muted                                        | `string`  | `undefined`       |
| `videoFit`          | `video-fit`          | The object fit of the video Defaults to 'cover'              | `string`  | `"cover"`         |
| `videoPosition`     | `video-position`     | The object position of the video Defaults to 'center center' | `string`  | `"center center"` |
| `videoSrcs`         | `video-srcs`         | The video url(s) seperated by spaces                         | `string`  | `undefined`       |
